actionConfiguration.body:
WITH
ins_trip_revenue_collection_log AS (UPDATE finance_trip_invoices
  SET status = {{statusOfInvoice.selectedOptionLabel}}, user_data = {{appsmith.store.user_data}}, updated_at=now(), hard_copy_receiving_date = now(),hard_copy_of_bill={{"'"+JSON.stringify(FilePicker1.files)+"'"}}
  WHERE id = {{ readyInvoiceTbl.selectedRow.id }}
	RETURNING id)
	UPDATE trip_level_invoice
  SET status = {{statusOfInvoice.selectedOptionLabel}}, updated_at=now() 
  WHERE finance_trip_invoice_id = (select id from ins_trip_revenue_collection_log)
